name: ZombieSmash! Time Travel
description:
Travel through time with Grandpa and his time machine! Protect the House from the primeval ancestors of zombies. They're waiting for you... And they've gotten pretty hungry!

HURRICANE GAMEPLAY

Equip Grandpa with the best guns and bombs and destroy all zombies before they reach your home! Awesome mix of shooter and arcade gameplay! Be sure to count your bullets, aim well, and make some big explosions!

ERAS OF ZOMBIE

Travel through the most interesting eras in the history of mankind! Visit the Jurassic World, Ancient Sparta, Ancient Asia, and other exciting times!

Dozens of gripping levels await you in every temporal episode with final bosses! Grab your sawn-off and get your Grandpa out of this mess.

TRULY WICKED GUNS

Tons of awesome weapons with their own special features! From a bazooka to an electric guitar! Upgrade your guns to deadly weapons! Use anvils and satellite strikes! Crush the zombie menace once and for all!

THIS SEQUEL TO THE ACTION-PACKED ZOMBIE SMASH BASKETBALL IS ALREADY TAKING OVER THE APP STORE!"
